h1.span: Doing Our Part for COVID-19 Research

p.span: The Whitley County School District is part of the state’s "digital first responders" in the fight against COVID-19. The Apple computers pictured, along with many others across the district, are part of the statewide DataseamGrid helping to find answers to keep Kentuckians healthy and moving forward. The work for drug discovery is currently being shifted from cancer research to COVID-19 treatment.
Please click this link for the full article from the University of Louisville Health Sciences Center: UofL News Release
